thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: AnthroSparky

author: AnthroSparky
title: AnthroSparky
text: I love Bundle Stars. I purchase games from my Steam, GoG, and Origin wishlists whenever I have the money. I think they have some great sales that go on. I've even bought bundles for games that weren't on my wishlist because I had been curious about them, but hadn't seen anyone playing them and didn't know about them because the deal that Bundle Stars had on them was that great.
